thread.title: Coyotes bring up Plachta, place Vitale on IR
thread.title_full: Coyotes bring up Plachta, place Vitale on IR

author: wtopstaff
title: Coyotes bring up Plachta, place Vitale on IR
text:
Home » News » Sports » NHL » Coyotes bring up Plachta,… Coyotes bring up Plachta, place Vitale on IR By The Associated Press October 19, 2015 6:40 pm 
GLENDALE, Ariz. (AP) — The Arizona Coyotes have recalled forward Matthias Plachta from Springfield of the AHL and placed center Joe Vitale on injured reserve with an upper-body injury. 
Plachta, a 24-year-old from Germany, appeared in three games with Springfield this season after starting his career in the Deutsche Eishockey Liga. He signed an entry-level contract with the Coyotes in May. 
Vitale was injured in Saturday’s game against Boston after a fight with the Bruins’ Kevan Miller. He went to the hospital for X-rays after the game. 
Vitale was a healthy scratch the first four games before making his season debut against Boston. Topics:
